name: sg-schema-sync
description: CLI tool to generate type-safe API clients from OpenAPI v3 specs

scripts.test-tool: rimraf test-output && pnpm build && node dist/cli.js -i https://dev.surveyapi.59club.studiographene.xyz/api/api-docs.json -o test-output --react-query
scripts.test-tool-config: rimraf test-output/api/config-test && pnpm build && node dist/cli.js -o test-output/api/config-test --react-query --config src/helpers/testconfig.ts
